ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: If you ever get bored and sit around in Misty Thicket when someone is killing Deputies, they drop a Squad Ring which is + to charisma. I can t remember how
ygData.messageBody:
If you ever get bored and sit around in Misty Thicket when someone is
killing Deputies, they drop a Squad Ring which is + to charisma. I can't
remember how much to charisma though. It's No Drop. I helped a guy by going
and selling the spears he looted and giving him all the plat back from it so
he let me loot the ring with a couple of my alts.
I still think that horsies and dinos should have inventory space to carry
things. Like pack mules and stuff in D&D.
luv,
-Su

> Yup, I couldn't agree more. I bought my druid two Opal Encrusted Steins a
> long time ago. They hike his charisma up to 105 when I carry them both and
> it's definitely very helpful.
>
> -= Mippon - Level 40 Druid Halfling =-
>
